title: (x) Vanity Fair masthead - VF Sans {Zara (self), Randy}
content:
Does someone know the typeface for the Vanity Fair masthead?   
   
thanks   
   
zara
author: Zara Evens

comments.content:
Ok, I may have posted for no reason-sorry   
   
   
Is it VFSans (Terminal City)?

thanks-   
and I did mean terminal design, terminal "city" is the paper I am reading right now, sorry about the word switch there.
